meanings.sent1: The puppy looked even woefuller after losing its favorite toy.

meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes held a woefuller gaze than anyone had ever seen before.

meanings.sent1: The stormy night grew even woefuller as the winds howled louder.
meanings.sent2: The woefuller the story became, the more captivated the audience was.
meanings.sent3: The woefuller sky seemed to be crying along with the mournful widow.
meanings.sent4: The woefuller melody of the song touched the hearts of all who listened.
